page.title: 08LAW AND ORDER
page.content: There is one policeman in Handcross The work is varied,some examples are dealing with road accidents, sudden deaths, burglaries, thefts,executing warrants, renewing firearm certificates,dealing with stray animals and general patrol of the area. .He has a motorcycle or an Austin Metro, both fitted with radio for communication with police headquarters in Lewes.He works an eight hour day. He works eight days on duty then he has two days off,then he has seven days on duty and then four days off. When he is off duty the village is covered by police from Balcombe or Cuckfield. He lives in the village in police owned property.
